mapper.insert: insert into articles (title, reprinted_from, keywords, abstracts, content, attribute, status, created_time) values (#{title}, #{reprintedFrom}, #{keywords}, #{abstracts}, #{content}, #{attribute}, #{status}, sysdate())
mapper.select: select article_id, title, status, reprinted_from, content, attribute, created_time, updated_time from articles
select article_id, title, status, reprinted_from, content, attribute, created_time, updated_time from articles
select article_id, title, status, reprinted_from, content, attribute, created_time, updated_time from articles where article_id = #{articleId}
